Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into three registers: 1 - Two jackals on plinths and Hieroglyphic text. 2 - Deceased seated before a table; six columns of text. 3 - Three kneeling figures; Hieroglyphic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 3. (pl.14)
